thread.section_title: Hotel Papa Germano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location & Great People
thread.title_full: Great Location & Great People - Review of Hotel Papa Germano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: shankarram17
title: Great Location & Great People
text:
The lady and gentleman in the front are always warm . This hostel is quite busy always but they always have the reassuring smile on their face. Its proximity to Termini is the most convenient . I stayed in their 4 bedroom dorm which was very comfortable .I had never had a television in my earlier hostels in Italy but this was interesting and had a sink inside .Very comfortable beds
Would highly recommend this place for a quick 2 or 3 night stay .
